chart_description: The IP Broadcast Bandwidth chart displays the amount of kilobits per second of broadcast traffic sent and received by the network interface. Broadcast traffic is a form of communication where data packets are sent to all the devices on the local network, and this chart helps in identifying the bandwidth consumption caused by such traffic.

dimension_descriptions.InBcastOctets: The amount of data received in kilobits per second by the network interface through broadcast traffic.
dimension_descriptions.OutBcastOctets: The amount of data sent in kilobits per second by the network interface through broadcast traffic.
